channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flooding across cycle lane and highway outside 44 SMR, 8th September
item.description:
All the drains are blocked at the end of Sandford Mill Road just before the junction with Old Bath Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Sandford Mill Road, Fairview, Cheltenham

School Lane, Prestbury between the school and Finchcroft Lane.

item.title: Water pools on road surface, 8th September
item.description:
In heavy rain, water pools at the end of athelnay way at the Hales Road Junction. IT pools as the road surface is below the level of the drains. Recent roadworks have not resolved the issue.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Athelney Way, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: General road markings, lines and stud issues problem, 8th September
item.description:
Customer had called in and had mentioned that the lines need to be repainted and made clearer as she has had a few incidents where peole almost hit them/ use the wrong lanes and it cause a few issues on the road thi has happened even when she has learner drivers with her as well. she is wondering if this can be looked into.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Horse Chestnut tree branch in urgent need of removal, 8th September
item.description:
Horse Chestnut tree on triangle of grass at the junction of Stockwell Lane and New Road, what3words forest.mock.branch. An arboriculturalist has advised me that, for public safety, the lowest branch needs to be removed within a month. The tree is in the Woodmancote Conservation Area and is the symbol of Woodmancote Village.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
